title: A change in the LP System?
body:
Can Riot implement a system where it changes the amount of LP lost depending on dc's?

I just played a game with 2 dc's and still lost a fair amount of LP. I was wondering if their was a way to limit the LP loss to the connected players whilst deducting LP from the dc'ed players.

replies.body:
Riot could possibly make something like this

If one  person was disconnected from the game for longer than 10 minutes you would lose 15lp instead of 20
If 2 people you would lose 10lp instead 15lp

This would  possibly cause people to just leave if they were losing hard and let the enemy team end the game so they don't lose so much lp.

Riot could then make it the person that is disconnected only loses 18lp instead of 20 

It's an idea but Riot could be working on something right now.
